column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Ahhhh!!! This is amazing. Although my first deep dish pizza
column2: it was nothing compared to regular pizza. I got a personal pizza with pepperoni and sausage. The malnatis classic. I also got some cheesy bread! Everything was fantastic including our waiter ( Adriano)!! He was super nice
column4: and funny as well as making us feel welcome. If you want some good Chicago deep dish pizza
column5: look no further. Lou Malnati's is the place to go!
